1. 数据库模型![img](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/starpick/dashboard/gh-pages/image/starpick722.bmp)

2. SQL

   ```sql
      -- +---------------------------------------------------------
      -- | MODEL       : starpick
      -- | AUTHOR      : loenop
      -- | GENERATED BY: Open System Architect
      -- +---------------------------------------------------------
      -- | WARNING     : Review before execution
      -- +---------------------------------------------------------

      -- +---------------------------------------------------------
      -- | CREATE
      -- +---------------------------------------------------------
      CREATE TABLE `comment`
      (
        commentid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        cContent VARCHAR(500),
        PRIMARY KEY (commentid)
      );

      CREATE TABLE `hash`
      (
        hashid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        hashName VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (hashid)
      );

      CREATE TABLE `tag`
      (
        tagid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        x DOUBLE,
        y DOUBLE,
        content VARCHAR(100),
        PRIMARY KEY (tagid)
      );

      CREATE TABLE `pick`
      (
        pickid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        catogory VARCHAR(50),
        brand VARCHAR(50),
        idolname VARCHAR(50),
        price VARCHAR(50),
        officialLink VARCHAR(100),
        size VARCHAR(20),
        pic VARCHAR(50),
        tagid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (pickid)
      );

      CREATE TABLE `entry`
      (
        entryId INTEGER NOT NULL,
        picture VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
        description VARCHAR(600),
        likeNumber INTEGER NOT NULL,
        dissNumber INTEGER NOT NULL,
        commentNumber INTEGER NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (entryId)
      );

      CREATE TABLE `user`
      (
        userid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        user_name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
        password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
        email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
        header VARCHAR(200),
        PRIMARY KEY (userid,email)
      );

      CREATE TABLE `like`
      (
        likeid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        userid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        entryId INTEGER NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (likeid)
      );

      CREATE INDEX idxlike1 ON like
      (
        userid
      );

      CREATE INDEX idxlike2 ON like
      (
        entryId
      );

      CREATE TABLE `dislike`
      (
        disslikeid SMALLINT NOT NULL,
        userid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        entryId INTEGER NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (disslikeid)
      );

      CREATE INDEX idxdislike1 ON dislike
      (
        userid
      );

      CREATE INDEX idxdislike2 ON dislike
      (
        entryId
      );

      CREATE TABLE `follow`
      (
        followid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        userid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        userid INTEGER NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (followid)
      );

      CREATE INDEX idxfollow1 ON follow
      (
        userid
      );

      CREATE INDEX idxfollow2 ON follow
      (
        userid
      );


   ```

3. 模型

   https://github.com/starpick/dashboard/blob/gh-pages/7.2databaseDesign/starpickDB.LMModel
